description:
Enhance user engagement with the Sticky Element Plugin for Bubble. This plugin enables you to make any HTML element sticky on your page, keeping it fixed in position while scrolling.

Instructions:

- Enable the option to assign ID attributes to HTML elements in your app settings (Settings - General).
- Assign unique IDs to the elements you want to make sticky on your page.
- Specify these IDs in the plugin settings to make those elements sticky during scrolling.
